OUR STORY
CONTACT
HOURS
Monday-Thursday 12pm-9pm
Friday-Saturday 12pm-10pm
Sunday 12pm-8pm
LOCATION
3469 Precision Drive
North Venice, Florida 34275
Located directly off the highway
941-218-4156
Directions
©2024 Back Porch Brewing Co.

EVENTS
We offer a variety of events at the Brewery in Venice, Florida.
Weekly Beer Releases!
Check out our Facebook and Instagram for new releases
Porch Sippin’ Summer Happy Hour
Every week-all summer long
Monday-Thursday 12pm-6pm
Rotational beer and wine selections
$4 Legacy Grilled Cheese
Anniversary Weekend
Friday August 22nd-Sunday August 24th
Cheers to 2 Years
Speciality Beer Releases
Lobster Paninis
Brisket Paninis with house-made chimichurri
Raffles & Giveaways
Sunday August 24th 3pm-5pm Music with Robbie Kay
Stay tuned for more events!
If you’re interested in hosting an event at Back Porch Brewing, corporate meeting, social get together, showers, birthdays, community events, just contact our event coordinator and we’ll help you plan a great time.
Contact Our Events Coordinator
Brett on Facebook
“I never knew about this place, until my brother was visiting and found it on google. I’ve been back 3 more times since. Great selection of wine, and craft beer. I’m a picky IPA drinker, so I usually start with a flight, then pick my favorite..”
Erick on Facebook
“Wow! What a place, first I want to give a shout out to our bartenders… They were very knowledgeable in their products, super nice and friendly..
The beer was great, the panini sandwich was the bomb.. That orange jelly jam on the sandwich was amazing!!
